thread.title: Air Canada Operation on Saturday is getting back to normal
thread.title_full: Air Canada Operation on Saturday is getting back to normal

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Air Canada Operation on Saturday is getting back to normal
text:
THE LIST: 5 Star Rated by eTN Readers - and not for sale! Hotels - Airlines - CVBs - Destinations - people Air Canada Operation on Saturday is getting back to normal Adv: 
Jul 04, 2015 Adv: 
Air Canada reports its operations are returning to normal this morning following an illegal labour disruption at Consolidated Aviation Fueling of Toronto (the sole fuel agent at Toronto Pearson) that affected the fueling of all airlines operating at Pearson International Airport yesterday. 
Air Canada advises that a small number of flights may be cancelled today as a result of the rollover effect from yesterday's disruption. The airline is working to transport all customers safely to their destinations as quickly as possibly and thanks customers for their patience during the disruption.
